abstract: BP, in the midst of a spurt of global deal-making, says it wants to sell its interests in some British oil and natural gas fields.
snippet: BP, in the midst of a spurt of global deal-making, says it wants to sell its interests in some British oil and natural gas fields.
lead_paragraph: BP, in the midst of a spurt of global deal-making, announced of Tuesday that it wanted to sell its interests in some British oil and natural gas fields.

headline.main: BP Moves to Shed Some British Assets
